display_long_description:
Join the fun in "Animal Blocks," a cool game where you can make friends, be creative, and think strategically! In this multiplayer adventure, you can create your own worlds and share them with players all around the globe. Pick a fun character, like a shark, alien, cat, zombie, ogre, or panda, each with special abilities to help you on your journey.

Use awesome weapons, from simple ones like plungers to the powerful Thor's Hammer, to play your way. Try exciting modes like "Infected Mode," where you chase and tag other players, or team up with friends in clans to build or break forts in fun battles that test your teamwork and creativity.

"Animal Blocks" is not just a game; it’s a place to express yourself and have fun. Build cool things, come up with smart strategies, or explore the amazing worlds made by other players. Whether you're fighting against other characters, creating big structures, or helping your clan become the best, every moment in "Animal Blocks" makes your adventure special!
